full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MYUR MDZAD YE SHES KYI MGON PO PHYAG DRUG PA'I GTOR CHOG DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008B (CES MYUR MDZAD YE SHES KYI MGON PO PHYAG DRUG PA'I GTOR CHOG DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DAM PA GONG MA RNAMS KYIS GSUNG BYIN RLABS CAN DU MA YID BZHIN DU YAN LAG BRGYAD DANG LDAN PA'I MTSO'I 'GRAM DU BA TZVA'I KHRON BPA BRKO BA'I DAL BA 'DI 'DRA MI DGOS 'DUG KYANG, ,RANG GI GAM DU GNAS PA'I @009A *, ,PA'I MTSON DPON BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS KYIS, ,MGON PO'I MNGON RTOGS, BSKANGS BSHAGS, ,BZLAS PA GTOR 'BUL, ,BSTOD BSKUL SOGS CHA TSANG ZHING, ,TSIG NYUNG BA RGYUN 'KHYER DU BYED RGYU ZHIG DGOS ZHES YANG YANG NANG GYIS BSKUL NGOR, BSKANGS BSHAGS GNYIS RJE BLA MA DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG PO'I MDZAD PA DANG, BSTOD PA RNYING GZHIR BZHAG ,GZHAN RNAMS CHOG SPYOD GSAR DU BGYIS TE BTZUN GZUGS DHARMA BADZRA GYI BGYID TSAL YID DGA' TSE 'PHEL DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI GON POS RJES SU 'DZIN PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
